text: is a town located in Kamikawa Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of April 28, 2017, the town has an estimated population of 5,086 and a density of 47 persons per km². The total area is 108.70 km². ==Lavender farm== Lavender field in Nakafurano Furano is famous for its numerous fields of lavender. ==References== ==External links== * *Official Website *Farm Tomita Website Category:Towns in Hokkaido
title: Nakafurano, Hokkaido
